column4: i have more problems, seing that the one with freezes will not get solved soon. I have installed pydance, and it gets an error, and dont start running. the message that appears is "sr0: CDROM not ready.  Make sure there is a disc in the drive." anyone know why?
you got the disc of that game?
nop, it used to work fine, because i have it instaled on my computer. I installed it from the console....
when i installed some songs it ask for the cdrom, but i not have any cd rom. I never have it
homepage says : Reads DWI, SM, and KSF files, in addition to its own .dance format.
so you have to have some sort of file for it to work, if it worked before
nah, seems it has music included, then i don't know... have you tried reinstalling it?
I tried, but if I install more songs in .dwi format, it dont work! if it runs I cant dance, but if I can dance it dont run!
hhm, strange sechs
Im getting familiar with strange things with ubuntu
pydance has hardly much to do with ubuntu
i also tryed to use stepmania with wine, but my wine dont works, so my last hope was pydance.
you could always try to contact the makers of pydance
i think i will install an older version of ubuntu. My pc dont like 10.04
maybe is the best way to solve my problems. I really dont want to get windows again...
well, could solve some problems
and if I install kubuntu? it will be easy to use like 10.04?
yep, though I don't know how different it is, haven't used kde in a while
and maybe you'll run into the same freeze problem, worth a try I would say
im dammned with linux, then....
i will try to reinstall all, if that doesnt works, i will install kubuntu. but that will wait to tomorrow. Thank you to everyone for the help really. See you soon!
